window.external

This feature is discouraged. For the rationale, see:

  • https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/obsolete.html#external

The window.external.AddSearchProvider() and window.external.IsSearchProviderInstalled() do nothing. Historically, they added external search providers to the browser.

Status

Discouraged

MDN documentation

No MDN documentation found.

Specifications

  • HTML (#external), from HTML Workstream (WHATWG).

Browser support

  • Chrome 9 Released on 2011-02-03
  • Chrome Android 18 Released on 2012-06-27
  • Edge 12 Released on 2015-07-29
  • Firefox 2 Released on 2006-10-24
  • Firefox for Android 4 Released on 2011-03-29
  • Safari ❌
  • Safari on iOS ❌

Baseline availability blocked since July 2015 by Safari (123 months)
